articles.title: If You'd Describe Yourself As A Neat Freak, I Honestly Can't Believe You Don't Already Have These 57 Products
articles.author: Maitland Quitmeyer
articles.summary: This article presents various cleaning and organization products available on Amazon. New product offerings include the Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop, the Shark Steam & Scrub steam mop, and the Flush 'n' Sparkle self-cleaning toilet system. These products aim to simplify cleaning tasks and improve home organization.

articles.title: 7 Best Night Cream Recommendations for Glowing and Youthful Skin
articles.author: Ikbal Tawakal
articles.summary: Pond's Age Miracle Ultimate Youth Night Cream combines hexyl-resorcinol, retinol-C, and niacinamide. It is formulated to accelerate skin regeneration, helping to fade fine lines, reduce milia, and leave skin looking fresh and healthy.

articles.title: 'I've brought out my favourite spring perfume now the warm weather is back'
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Kayali's Vanilla Candy Rock Sugar perfume is highlighted as a suitable fragrance for warmer weather, described as a blend of floral and fruity gourmand notes. The reviewer swaps out heavier, vanilla-based perfumes like Noyz Unmute and Eilish by Billie Eilish for this lighter scent as the weather heats up.

articles.title: Can Alibaba win the 30-minute war in street-level blitzkrieg of instant online shopping?
articles.author: Leo Zhang
articles.summary: Alibaba launched a new "flash purchase" tab on its Taobao app on April 30, making the service available to all users on May 2. This service, supported by Alibaba's Ele.me delivery platform and billions in subsidies, aims to deliver items within half an hour. The goal is to integrate this service into Taobao to evolve into a leaner, closer, and stickier shopping experience.

articles.title: 128TB SSD going mainstream as Innodisk announces its Gen5 flagship solid state drive with 14GBps read speeds
articles.author: Wayne Williams
articles.summary: Innodisk has launched its first PCIe Gen5 SSD series, targeting the high-performance data center market. The new drives offer up to 128TB capacity and 14GBps read speeds, supporting multiple form factors like U.2, EDSFF E1.S, E3.S, and E3.L.

articles.title: Next's 'comfy but elegant' £22 sandals come in 6 colours and 'will clearly last'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: Next is offering the Forever Comfort Slot Mule Sandals for £22. The sandals come in six colors and various fits including standard, wide and extra wide. They are available for purchase on the Next website.

articles.title: Android Desktop Mode Is Coming: Google's DeX Rival Finally Surfaces
articles.summary: Google is launching a new 'Desktop Mode' for Android, designed to enhance productivity by emulating PC-like functionalities on external displays. This feature, similar to Samsung's DeX, will offer improved app integration, a more flexible windowed layout, and multitasking capabilities, including launching multiple apps in floating windows. The initial preview suggests Google is leveraging desktop windowing features previously available on tablets to provide a smartphone-controlled desktop experience.

articles.title: Next shoppers 'ditch' floral prints for £34 dress with 'striking' summer design
articles.author: Léonie Benhamouche
articles.summary: Next has introduced the Cream Mono Placement Floral Linen Scoop Back Mini Shift Dress, retailing for £34. The dress is made from a lightweight linen-blend fabric and is available in petite and regular sizes. It is offered in multiple colors and prints.

articles.title: A Lifetime Supply of Perfume Gets You a Surprising Automotive Gift
articles.author: Elana Scherr
articles.summary: Debauchery is offering a new package deal that includes 100 bottles of unisex perfume called DB01, 2000 bottles of body wash, and 2000 bars of soap, all sharing a vintage New York City scent, along with a complimentary 1988 Rolls-Royce Silver Spur for $85,000. The Rolls-Royce is described as sourced, restored, eccentric, maximalist, and bold.

articles.title: Michigan State upsets No. 6 Oregon 2-0 in series opener
articles.summary: StateNews.com introduces a new version of its service, inviting users to test drive the platform.

articles.title: UAAGI now carries ‘new energy vehicle' specialist Radar
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: United Asia Automotive Group, Inc. (UAAGI) is launching the Radar brand, a new energy vehicle (NEV) specialist, in the Philippines. Radar's core product for global expansion is the RD6 pickup, an electric SUV/pickup truck hybrid. The launch signifies UAAGI's commitment to providing new energy mobility options in the Philippines and redefine the pickup truck segment.

articles.title: How to Start NSFW AI Chat Without Filters by Crushon AI
articles.author: CRUSHON AI INC
articles.summary: Crushon AI has launched a web-based conversational NSFW AI platform, incorporating over 17 language models like Claude 3.7 Sonnet and GPT-4o mini, designed for emotionally engaging conversations. The platform emphasizes user agency, offering unmediated interaction, custom character creation, and advanced features without requiring login or API implementation, targeting users seeking uncensored AI chat experiences.

articles.title: New to The Street Acquires 15% Equity Stake in CommercialVille, Launches National Media Campaign Featuring Patent-Backed Platform
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: New to The Street acquired a 15% equity stake in CommercialVille, a zip code-targeted video search engine platform. This deal facilitates a multi-platform media rollout to increase brand visibility and onboard more advertisers. The investment also provides New to The Street with full rights to CommercialVille's patent portfolio.

articles.title: New to The Street Acquires 15% Equity Stake in CommercialVille, Launches National Media Campaign Featuring Patent-Backed Platform
articles.author: New To The Street
articles.summary: CommercialVille, a video search engine platform, received a 15% equity investment from New to The Street. The platform empowers small businesses to reach local customers through geo-targeted video ads, offering a direct connection to consumers. CommercialVille's platform aims to redefine video search for small businesses by providing a cost-effective, IP-protected advertising solution.

articles.title: Samsung unveils budget-friendly Galaxy A06 5G
articles.author: The Manila Times
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A06 5G in the Philippines. This new smartphone targets users seeking affordability while maintaining features such as fast connectivity, reliable performance, and hardware-based security.

articles.title: Samsung launches AI-powered QLED and Crystal 4K UHD TVs in India, available now on Amazon, Flipkart
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Samsung launched its new AI-powered QLED and Crystal 4K UHD TVs in India on May 1, 2025. The QLED QEF1 series features Real and Safe Quantum Dot Technology and the Q4 AI Processor, while the Crystal Clear 4K UHD series includes models UE81, UE84, and UE86 with the Crystal 4K Processor and 4K Upscaling. The new TVs are available on Amazon, Flipkart, and Samsung.com with launch offers including discounts and EMI options.

articles.title: Lancashire Food & Drink round-up: coffee, McDonald's, Aldi Nando's, and a £20 toastie
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: McDonald's introduced its new May menu featuring items like a frozen cherry lemonade and a Biscoff frappe. Mary Brown's (MB) Chicken launched its fourth UK store in Preston. Aldi unveiled its returning Taste of Mexico range with new flavors and the UK's first still Prosecco. Costa Coffee launched a limited-edition Vanilla Lavender Iced Whipped Latte, and Caffè Nero introduced a new nationwide matcha range of drinks.

articles.title: 120W charging phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Vivo's sub-brand iQOO is preparing to launch the iQOO Neo 10, promising segment-leading performance. The product will be available on Amazon.

articles.title: Nacon Revolution X Unlimited controller review: customisation is king
articles.author: Eurogamer
articles.summary: Nacon's Revolution X Unlimited is a new pro-grade Xbox controller aimed at rivaling Microsoft's Elite Series 2.

articles.title: Amazon update that could affect everyone with an Alexa
articles.author: Jordan Coussins
articles.summary: Amazon has launched an updated version of Alexa, called Alexa+, which promises more human-like interactions using generative AI. Alexa+ is currently being rolled out to customers and is designed to manage sophisticated tasks like making reservations and controlling smart home devices. Amazon aims to improve the accuracy and functionality of Alexa+ with further development of the Nova Act browsing engine.

articles.title: Shopping Bots Are Coming — But Will Consumers Ever Trust Them With Their Wallets?
articles.author: Tikue Anazodo
articles.summary: Visa has opened its payments infrastructure to AI agents with tokenized, AI-ready cards. PayPal released a developer toolkit that makes it easier for AI agents to integrate. Amazon is also developing AI shopping agents, signaling a move towards AI-driven shopping experiences.

articles.title: ⚡Galaxy Z Fold 7 Launch Timeline Tipped; Check Details of Upcoming Samsung Foldable Device
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 in July 2025. This foldable smartphone may feature upgrades like a Snapdragon processor, a 200MP camera, and an 8-inch inner display, and is expected to be slimmer.

articles.title: Tesla Offers Discounts on New Model Y Amid Soft Demand
articles.summary: Tesla is offering Model Y owners a promotion to upgrade to the newest version of the all-electric crossover. The company recently launched the updated Model Y in markets across the globe.

articles.title: Google is finally building its own DeX: First look at Android's Desktop Mode
articles.author: Mishaal Rahman
articles.summary: Google is developing a desktop mode for Android, similar to Samsung DeX, allowing users to launch multiple apps in resizable windows on external displays. This feature, currently in development and tested on Pixel devices, includes a taskbar for pinned and recent apps. The release is speculated to be in a quarterly release or with Android 17.

articles.title: 27 Nike Clothing Pieces You'll Want To Wear For Every Workout From Here On Out
articles.author: Lesley Chen
articles.summary: Nike is showcasing a variety of new athletic apparel and shoes. The product range includes sports bras, hoodies, running shoes, leggings, biker shorts, tank tops, training shoes, sweatpants, T-shirts, socks, pants, caps, shorts, slides, skirts, jackets, long-sleeve tops, joggers, hoodies, sleeveless tops, fleece shorts, leggings, sports bras, and sweatshirts.  Each item has its price, available sizes, and colors.

articles.title: Victoria's Secret launches affordable crinkle swimsuits rivalling £175 designer version
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: Victoria's Secret has launched a new affordable crinkle swimsuit collection, including a £35 one-piece crinkle swimsuit, rivalling designer versions like Hunza G's £175 swimsuit. The Pure Black Crinkle Scoop Swimsuit is available in black and red and features enhanced stretch and recovery.

articles.title: B&M £4.99 buy makes it quick and easy to get streak free clean windows
articles.author: Emma Gill
articles.summary: Beldray has introduced the Antibac 2 in 1 Spray Window Cleaner, a product featuring a spray bottle with an attached microfibre pad and squeegee. This new product aims to simplify window cleaning by combining spraying, wiping, and squeegeeing into one tool, offering streak-free results with minimal ongoing cost.

articles.title: These 32 Products Are Perfect For Anyone Who Wants Amazing Results With Minimal Effort
articles.author: Rebecca O'Connell
articles.summary: The article showcases a range of new product releases, including a Revlon hot air brush for hair styling, a Roomba robot vacuum for automated floor cleaning, and a self-cleaning litter box for pet owners. It also features the RobeCurls heatless hair curler by Emikeni. These products are highlighted with user reviews and details about their functionality and benefits, emphasizing ease of use and problem-solving capabilities.

articles.title: Taiwan's Nommii instant noodles co-founder calls out Singapore's Nommi for similar brand identity
articles.summary: Singaporean company Shake Salad rebranded to Nommi in early 2024 to offer a wider range of food, launching a new identity with ready-to-eat products like sandwiches and onigiri. These Nommi products are now sold in over 500 retail stores islandwide. This rebrand and expanded product line was a strategic decision to support their new fleet of smart fridges.

articles.title: 27 Orgasm-Worthy Sex Toys From Lovehoney That Work So Well, It's Basically Witchcraft
articles.author: Cierra Cowan
articles.summary: Lovehoney introduces a range of new sex toys, including mini-massage wands, vibrators, dildos, and clitoral stimulators. These products feature varied functionalities such as rechargeable batteries, waterproof designs, and different vibration settings, catering to diverse preferences for individual and partnered use.

articles.title: Our plans to remove fear, guesswork from online transactions
articles.author: Chioma Okoye
articles.summary: Yanga Plug has launched its Marketplace, a digital platform in Nigeria designed to streamline everyday tasks. The platform offers services such as buying and selling pre-owned items, escrow payment system, affordable data bundles, bill payments, virtual dollar cards, and business registration. The Yanga Plug app is available for download on both the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

articles.title: Naturals by Watsons unveils next-generation innovations
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Naturals by Watsons is introducing new body scrubs to their product line. The new body scrubs are made with natural ingredients and are available in stores.
